oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Militia knapsack
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a Civil War era militia knapsack with the number 8 painted on the outside flap and a D on the inside flap. On the side that would ride against the back is a small paper tag with the name " J. Higgins, Co. D." These knapsacks are often referred to as "hardpacks" due to the fact that it has a rigid wooden frame within the bag.
